Creative Performance Insights & Strategy Report

Top Spending Static Ad Performance Review & Improvement Strategy

Inventive Creator

Spend$3400
ROAS3.2
CPA$12

ANALYSIS:

  • • Stellar Media: Achieved a remarkable 2.75x ROAS with a competitive $0.58 CPC, showcasing effective ad placements and audience targeting strategies that resonate well with potential customers.
  • • GreenLeaf Nutrition: Currently struggling with a 0.85x ROAS, indicating a pressing need for a comprehensive strategy reassessment to enhance engagement and conversion rates in future campaigns.
  • • Top-performing campaign: Oceanic Bliss | BOF, which delivered an impressive 4.35x ROAS, highlighting the effectiveness of creative messaging.

Top Creative Review

Thoughtful
ROAS: 3.2CPA: $12
Creative
ROAS: 2.1CPA: $10
Design
ROAS: 4.1CPA: $15

Visual Elements Assessment:

The current top-performing static ad features a UGC-style testimonial approach with strong product visibility. The creative includes:

  • Testimonial Format: Relatable man holding Barrister and Mann shaving soap
  • Product Placement: Clear product visibility with directional arrow
  • Text Overlay: Testimonial with emojis for engagement
  • Social Proof: Customer experience narrative

Copy Structure Breakdown:

  • Hook: "Do you want to smell like everyone else, or do you want to be awesome? 🤔"
  • Value Proposition: "Every Barrister and Mann scent is unique and captivating—no imitations"
  • Call-to-Action: "Join the revolution and dare to be different"

Performance Context:

With a 3.14% CTR, this creative is clearly in Meta's "sweet spot" - achieving stable performance and efficient spend allocation. However, the high frequency (9.5) in BOF retargeting campaigns indicates potential audience exhaustion requiring creative refresh.

Strategic Framework Assessment

Positive Findings
  • Broad targeting strategy aligns with Meta's algo
  • Strong CTR (3.14%) indicates sweet spot
Areas of Concern
  • High frequency (9.5) suggests exhaustion
  • Single creative carrying majority of spend

  • • GreenLeaf Nutrition: Currently struggling with a 0.85x ROAS, indicating a pressing need for a comprehensive strategy reassessment to enhance engagement and conversion rates in future campaigns.
  • • Top-performing campaign: Oceanic Bliss | BOF, which delivered an impressive 4.35x ROAS, highlighting the effectiveness of creative messaging.

Top Creative Review

Thoughtful
ROAS: 3.2CPA: $12
Creative
ROAS: 2.1CPA: $10
Design
ROAS: 4.1CPA: $15

Visual Elements Assessment:

The current top-performing static ad features a UGC-style testimonial approach with strong product visibility. The creative includes:

  • Testimonial Format: Relatable man holding Barrister and Mann shaving soap
  • Product Placement: Clear product visibility with directional arrow
  • Text Overlay: Testimonial with emojis for engagement
  • Social Proof: Customer experience narrative

Copy Structure Breakdown:

  • Hook: "Do you want to smell like everyone else, or do you want to be awesome? 🤔"
  • Value Proposition: "Every Barrister and Mann scent is unique and captivating—no imitations"
  • Call-to-Action: "Join the revolution and dare to be different"

Performance Context:

With a 3.14% CTR, this creative is clearly in Meta's "sweet spot" - achieving stable performance and efficient spend allocation. However, the high frequency (9.5) in BOF retargeting campaigns indicates potential audience exhaustion requiring creative refresh.

Strategic Framework Assessment

Positive Findings
  • Broad targeting strategy aligns with Meta's algo
  • Strong CTR (3.14%) indicates sweet spot
Areas of Concern
  • High frequency (9.5) suggests exhaustion
  • Single creative carrying majority of spend
